# removeAllActions()

**Instance Method**

Clears the undo and redo stacks and reenables the manager.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeAllActions()
```

## Related Documentation

- **enableUndoRegistration()**: Enables the recording of undo operations.

## Clearing undo operations

- **removeAllActions(withTarget:)**: Clears the undo and redo stacks of all operations involving the specified target as the recipient of the undo message.
